question: Wow, I feel a thousand questions coming on today!I've been T1 diabetic for a couple of decades, diagnosed in my mid-20s.  I'm reading lots online about the prevalence of T1 diabetes in HCV+ people.Any other T1s here?I'm now left wondering if the onset of my T1 correlates with my infection of HCV...  If so, I've had HCV for a very long time.  :(  I'm 46 now.
title: Type 1 diabetes and HCV
